turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to order some pizzas from my favorite pizza restaurant, Veto Pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Which Veto pizza location would you like to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one off of Decatur, near my house.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay so the Veta pizza on Decatur Blvd. Is this going to be an online order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes you can just order it online.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What kind of pizza would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay I'm going to need 2 extra large pizzas because we are having a little going away party.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What kind of crust would you like them to be?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want them both to be thin crust pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What kind of toppings do you want on them?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay for the first pizza I want olives, chicken, and artichoke.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: They don't appear to have artichoke on the menu.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Really? Ah..they used to have it..well in that case olives, chicken, and jalapeno.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What do you want on the second pizza?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The second one should be a meat lovers.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The meat lovers shows pepperoni, sausage, and ham, is that the one you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes that's the one.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like any breadsticks or sides with the order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes I need a large order of breadsticks and 2 family sized caesar salads.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is there anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No that's all I need

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay so thats 2 extra large pizzas from Veto pizza on decatur, one meat lovers, and the other with olives, chicken, and jalapeno and you want a large breadsticks and 2 caesar salads.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect, thank you so much!

items.name: one off of Decatur, near my house
